heading: Diablo 4 Patch 1.2 for Season 2 â€“ Massive Changes Incoming!
content: Grab your local Starbucks...not a coffee, the whole damn store because we got a lot to go over in the latest that were just released. Massive improvements to many systems. Quality of Life in many key parts of the player's day-to-day activities. Introduction of new End Game Bosses. Updates to over performing stats along with Class balancing, Items, Materials, Currencies and so much MORE! Let's hit that diving board and dive into it. Keep in mind, while we have the patch notes, the patch officially goes live next with the launch of Season 2 - Season of Blood. New Unique items harboring immense power have been unearthed just in time for Season of Blood. The Unique items below can only be acquired from playing on World Tier IV in either the Eternal or Seasonal Realms. The Aspect below can be found on Boots and Amulets. The Aspects below can be found on Amulets, Gloves, Rings, and Weapons. The value ranges provided for the Paragon Glyphs below reflect them at Level I and at their maximum of Level 21. Gems will no longer drop from regular sources, and can instead be crafted at a Jeweler. With this absolute massive patch coming, the game as we know it is going to shift quite a bit! The will be breaking down all parts of this patch down into Seasonal Guides in our Resources menu. We're working on New & updated (with season release), updated , and more that you have come to expect from us. With that said, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development to make the most of your Season 2 experience! Written by:
